Nice easy to use features, great price, very flexible wide range of features and sharp crisp pictures.The only thing needed is more megapixels and now the new version is out in 9 mp.

Reviews.Title: Nice compact camera
Reviews.Author: Rocio Jaimes
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this product if you are not really looking for an up-to-date compact camera. I have it since 2009 and it still offers a nice performance. Its lens definitely was worth for the money I payed for the camera back in the day, but if you want to record some live footage on a concert (for example), you should consider a newer Panasonic model. I sure will buy another camera by this brand if I ever change my old Lumix.

Reviews.Title: Great Point And Shoot!
Reviews.Author: Michael Patrick Mccartney
Reviews.Content: It's not top of the line, but I like all the features, and ease of use, and it takes beautiful photos.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera and am buying another one even though this one broke...
Reviews.Author: Sara Marie Miller
Reviews.Content: This camera takes the best photos! I bought it after seeing a friend's photos on her blog and inquired into what she was using to get such focused vibrant close ups.It is super lightweight, zooms in close, deals with low lighting better than most and does all you need and more for a basic point and shoot. A Leica lens for $50? Yes!I take this little gem with me everywhere and take shots almost daily.  Unfortunately I scratched the lens and the shutter is frozen in the open position but this camera gets tossed around like a rock in a tumbler. I am buying a new one today- great price and best camera I have ever owned. Planning to take better care of this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Cammera
Reviews.Author: Chase
Reviews.Content: This is one of the nicest camera's out there for the price bar none. I have gone through several cameras and Panasonic gives by far the best picture quality, Image stabilization is great, And it couldn't be any easier to use. Our family has 3 of them. And they can take a lot of abuse and keep right on performing like new. I used to be a Sony fan. But this camera puts Sony to shame.

Reviews.Title: Great travel camera
Reviews.Author: Gregory S. Simmons
Reviews.Content: I have had for 6 years and it still works great. Basically the best pocket camera you can get with a great wide screne shot required for travel pics. I have read many comparisons on picture quality under a variety of conditions and this phone gets rated high. I have used for fireworks, night, beach, landscape, inside muesems, etc and it works perfect. I have pictures set to 4-6MP so cameras that have anything above that is kind of a waste. No one wants a 20mb picture file unless you plan to print it off poster size lol.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Savvy "Smart Consumer"
Reviews.Content: I carry this camera every day - you never know when you're going to have a 'Kodak' moment.It's light; take great pictures; great video; great zoom; no red eye; automatic face detection; etc.  Too many great features to mention.I have had it for a few years and I'm sure the latest models are even better.  But for the price this was/is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: freetolio "freetolio"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a few years ago from Amazon, and it has been great.  I have taken it in hot, cold, and humid areas and it has held up great.  I have no plans to buy any other camera anytime soon.Pros:It is very, very sold feeling and a bit weighty.The lens assembly is very solid, so you don't feel like you will break the zoom components when you are wiping down the outer lens.10x optical zoomPanoramic modeGood automatic setting properly detects most setting situations.Very minimal shutter lag.Easy access to white balance, metering, and other manual controlsCons:You can have poor performance in low light.  You can correct this by fixing the camera on a solid surface, but this camera will sometimes introduce an almost impressionistic noise instead of blurring up like a typical camera when you are moving it in these conditions.  IMHO, this is worse than regular blur.Autofocus can slow down the viewfiender even though this was mostly mitigated by the firmware update.I used to have a Fuji Finepix 2650 (which eventually failed electronically), then a Kodak C360 (someone broke it), then a Kodak V530 (started losing screws and physically coming apart), and then I got this in 2008.  Since then I have also gotten a waterproof DV unit (GE DV1).  This camera produces better daytime pictures than any of those others (though it is higher resolution).  Kodak cameras seem to really do well at automatically reducing noise in some specific situations in a way that this camera does not automatically do, but overall it still wins out for daylight usage.  Low light performance is somewhat dubious.  Perhaps using manual controls could mitigate this.Even in spite of bad night shots, I have to give this camera its due praise and recommend it heartily.

Reviews.Title: Great camera - Panasonic Lumix
Reviews.Author: happy traveler
Reviews.Content: I needed a small camera to take to Italy. Last summer, my cousin was showing me her Panasonic Lumix and highly recommending it. I remembered her telling me that she researched extensively before she chose it. Taking her word for it, I got online and purchased this little Panasonic Lumix from amazon.com, and my cousin was SPOT ON. This camera is wonderful! Its magnification, Leica lens and ease of use are features which culminate in excellent quality photos. This camera has it all for a very reasonable price - and I don't even have the latest Lumix! I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: best camera I've ever had
Reviews.Author: Vero Saenz "bicycle rider"
Reviews.Content: this camera is very easy to use, has a great zoom for it's size and it's lens is one of the best on the market...two people have purchased this camera on my recommendation  after seeing my pictures..

Reviews.Title: Really outstanding more than I've expected
Reviews.Author: Miguel Gonzalez "miguelocta"
Reviews.Content: Really have been a great surprise for me and my family, we have enjoyed this camera for a while and its excellent in all senses: great resolution, the battey life is very long, the display superb, easy to use (even my 5-years old son take pictures with it). Strongly recommended.

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: Lloyd E. Ramsey
Reviews.Content: The main thing that I do not like about this tiny camera is that it is not SLR.  I cannot see enough of what will be in the frame to frame a photo.  That remains true for me for the early stages of zooming; and the slighly larger screen of the next model would not be enough better for me.  I have to trust the amazing resolution to crop and resize later.  The tiny size is also slow and tedious for me to handle without smudging the screen or shifting a setting button.  I'm moving around in rather rough terrain, using a tripod.  The lightness and size can have some advantages.  Not having to fool with a light meter is nice; but some of the images are over-exposed, and I have not learned to use the iA options.  With medium resolution for 3x2 aspect, I'm gettting 35 photos with internal memory, and with flash off have not recharged the battery yet.  None of the bundled software has even been loaded, so no comments on that.Not being able to pay for a digital SLR, I am very pleased with this one and would not trade it for another small one.  Some photos have been added at [..] for you to see by the dates.

Reviews.Title: Best camera I've ever owned
Reviews.Author: 280te_chick
Reviews.Content: I did not purchase this camera from Amazon, rather from a local camera shop. However, I need to tell you that this camera is really fantastic. I have been a traditional 35mm user (OK point and shoot) for many years and feared the transition to digital because of the menus and sub menus to refine my photos. I've tried to use digital cameras that were not my own and always manged to mix up the settings!  The Panasonic DMC-TZ4 is very easy to use and dare I say "Intuitive". Photo quality is sharp and I'm very pleased with my purchase. It has been dropped twice from waist level and survived - one year old and operating great. You should not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Small and Powerful
Reviews.Author: kpm "kpm"
Reviews.Content: The camera is small, light weight, but it is a solid construction. It has a 10x optical zoom which is very useful for taking pictures of animals in nature or objects or people at large distance. It also has a wide angle, which allows to get everybody in the picture, even in a small room. The macro settings allow for sharp focusing at very short distance, e.g. close up of a blossom. In off state, the lens is nicely protected with an automatic lens cover. Three different USB connectors allow for hooking it up to pretty much everything. I like it.

Reviews.Title: One of the best point and shoots!!!
Reviews.Author: Swapnil
Reviews.Content: I own a Nikon 5600 point and shoot and was satisfied with it... Later I upgraded to an entry level SLR (Nikon D60)..However, it was not possible for me to take the D60 everywhere and so was in need of a point n shoot that could give me good pictures and a good optical zoom in any lighting conditions..After reading a lot of reviews about the Tz4K I finally bought one...I am very satisfied with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Very Nice all Around Camera
Reviews.Author: H. Gress
Reviews.Content: You don't need to do much to get a good picture just click the button and it Takes great pictures 99% of the time. The zoom is great also,has come in handy many times. The only down side to this camera is that it is kinda bulky to just stick in your purse, but that's about it.

Reviews.Title: The greatest especially for shaky hands...~!.
Reviews.Author: Marilyn R. Parker "Indy Quilter"
Reviews.Content: I have been taking digital for a few years..and sell my shots.  Since developing essential tremors...had a bit of a problem.  This camera really, really helps stabilize...love it...

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Jamie Anderson "Jamie"
Reviews.Content: I had a panasonic luminix in the past. I love the zoom in a small camara. The pic quality is not always consistant. And theres a lag between shots

Reviews.Title: I Love This Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Virginia Serghides
Reviews.Content: I shopped for awhile before buying this camera--I was happy when I found all the features I was hoping for in a moderately priced camera.  I took it on vacation and found it easy to use, small enough to carry in my purse, and it takes great pictures.  I kept it on the auto setting, and was able to get some great photos of birds and other wildlife--really, the photos were better than what I could see myself, plus great shots of friends even in less-than-ideal light settings.  This is a great camera for someone who wants to take good pictures but isn't really into all the tech-y stuff--the camera does it all for you.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas Rikert "Nihilist"
Reviews.Content: I owen three Panasonic Cameras.One of the best on the market.The lense, made by Leica, makes a big difference in regards to the picture quality.This one was a gift for my sister.She really likes it.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMC-TZ4
Reviews.Author: Ron M
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after using one belonging to a friend.  I'm very satisfied with the picture quality and the ease of use.  I like the zoom capabilites the 10X combined with the digital zoom allows me to take decent pictures even at a far distance.Two things I find annoying at times.  In bright sunlight, the monitor is hard to see and on ocassion I find myself pushing the menu button with my thumb while handing the camera.  Neither one of these things are major issues for me and I would recommend purchasing this camera.

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A. Mihok
Reviews.Content: Well designed camera. Has alot of features if you know how to use them.It's intimidating at first, but with some experience with it, it will be worth having. Good price well designed to navigate through the screen.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Daley "Cylence"
Reviews.Content: The rapid burst is awesome. The settings take some getting used to, but overall it's very easy to adjust to. I am very very pleased w/ my purchase :)

Reviews.Title: excellent pocket camera with best value
Reviews.Author: L. Li
Reviews.Content: thought it is still not the match for the DSLR camera, it is best pocket camera in its kind for everything.If you are the architect like me, you will love the wide angel zoom for the interior shots.very happy with what I got.

Reviews.Title: Great zoom for our trip to China!
Reviews.Author: M. Ruzek
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a new compact camera with a modest price tag.  After researching I decided to get this Panasonic Lumix with 10X zoom (the largest of any compact) and am very pleased with it.  We took it on our vacation to China and were able to get some great shots that we could not get with our old HP.  My husband was using the Panasonic and I had the HP, so we have side-by-side comparisons.  It was also nice to be able to use the movie function to record messages for our family and friends and post them on Facebook so they could keep up with our trip.  Very satisfied with this camera.  One note: get a large - 8GB or more - memory card if you plan to take movies.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Hugo Coster
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures and does it without me having to do any serious input.  On the first day I spent an hour figuring out what the buttons meant and testing the different settings effects.  It wasn't difficult, simply try out what kind of modes you like the best and thats it.  I bought an extra battery because my last camera would stop after 100 pictures but this one works for much longer.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC - TZ4S 8. 1MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Barry L. Burtnett
Reviews.Content: Great camera with good features. The pictures are clear. I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: great point and shoot camera with room to learn
Reviews.Author: Samantha Crisp "Sammie"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera.  It takes great point and shoot pictures but also has more advanced features.  I'm still learning the details, but for a novice photographer this camera is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: K. DeBoer
Reviews.Content: Overall I love my camera.  It gives great pictures and has so many features for its tiny size.  The only thing I don't like is it seems to be a little slower recovering from flash pictures than I was led to believe, even with the battery fully charged.  I wouldn't give it up though - small enough to go everywhere and powerful enough for large pictures.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Otis
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera and I absolutely love it.  The Lumix is very easy to use, takes wonderful and very clear pictures, and excellent movies.  The 10x zoom is the best feature, allowing for some really nice shots.  The battery holds the charge for as long as needed, and recharges in about an hour.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: the best price/quality product
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Maripan
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera for the price, if you are looking for a slim, lightweight wide angle camera, this is the best choicePros.I'm currently using this camera at the mountains in South America (Los Andes) even at 5000 mt. works perfectly, the image quality is very good, the optical zoom is incredible consideranig the size of the camera, ligth weight and strong structure.Cons.is not so good for taking pictures at night, but is fairly good considering the price.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix camera
Reviews.Author: Stacy R. Groggel
Reviews.Content: Good point and shoot camera...could be better for indoor shots where flash is necessary but happy with it overall.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DTZ4
Reviews.Author: Shirley M. Snyder "Shirley Snyder"
Reviews.Content: Cmaera is awesome.  Excellent features, including icamera, variety of SD cards, digital zoom, quality lens, overall body size, and ease of handling.  Camera takes quality videos - even for wedding and important functions.  Newer design is smaller and has added grip for ease of holding.If there is a drawback, its the side door for external plugins.  Door can open with hand position until your use to it. Door is located under strap mount on right side.I have the DTZ1 and thought that was wonderful until I purchased the DTZ4.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Hannelore Hansen
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. The photo quality is great. I only wish it had an optical viewfinder in addition to the LCD screen. Otherwise this camera is first rate.

Reviews.Title: Love the Panasonic
Reviews.Author: Jacine
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as an upgraded replacement camera. We love the Panasonic digital cameras. They are well constructed and provide beautiful picture quality. We would recommend the Panasonic TZ4K for serious beginners and intermediate level photographers.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Patsycline2u
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I purchased this camera for my husbands Christmas gift. The service and shipping time was terrific and he loves this camera. I shopped and shopped to find the extra zoom power and talked to many sales people in camera depts as well as reading the reviews online. This was the least expensive place I found it including all the pre holiday "door busters"Thanks Amazon......

Reviews.Title: All around wide angle lens winner
Reviews.Author: Anna Pavlova
Reviews.Content: I needed a wide angle lens camera for real estate work, and this works just fine.  I also had fun with pictures during a holiday trip to Philadelphia and the light show at the old Wanamakers (now Macy's) department store. My only problem was when I didn't realize I had shot a short video instead of a still shot. You can hear the music playing at the light show as the camera takes a shot of the tree and then goes down to the floor as it kept shooting after I thought it had done its work.  That only happened once. I had a 1 g disc at home and found there is plenty of room on it for hundreds of pictures, although the battery has to be charged once in a while.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and excellent vendor
Reviews.Author: Doc
Reviews.Content: The camera is everything I wanted.  I checked it out in the store before I bought it so knew what I was getting.  I used it on a cruise and it was wonderful.  I was surprised by how well the videos it took came out.  Pictures are excellent quality and the 10x optical zoom is great.  The vendor was incredibly quick.  I ordered the camera on a Sunday and had it Tuesday morning - the shipping only cost me $5.00.  Best deal on the internet.  I would definitely use this same company again.

Reviews.Title: Best Christmas gift I ever got!
Reviews.Author: C. A. Lehman "stoogeswoman"
Reviews.Content: My husband gave this to me for Christmas and I absolutely love it!  I have never owned a digital camera before, and have resisted buying one for myself.  In fact, the last camera I used was one of those 35mm disposables you get at the drugstore!  I just didn't understand a lot of the technological stuff involved and was afraid I'd be overwhelmed if there were too many complicated features.  My thoughtful husband did some research and came up with this one - and it's just right!  After fiddling around with the buttons and dials for a couple of days, I "got it" and took some wonderful pictures - even started making movies!  It's also very easy to download the pictures onto the computer.  If you're hesitant about jumping into the world of digital photography, this would be a great camera to start out with!

Reviews.Title: This camera is great.
Reviews.Author: V. Walk
Reviews.Content: A friend of mine who is a professional photographer owns and recommended this camera.  I own a Canon 30D, but wanted something compact to take on a cruise over the holidays.  I absolutely love the camera.  No excessive out of focus photos.  The 30D has been spending more time on the shelf and less in my hands.  The TZ4 is simple to operate and feels like a quality piece of equipment. I liked the camera so much that I purchased another one as a Christmas present for my father.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Patrick Stevens
Reviews.Content: I don't understand why people are saying that this camera's picture quality is low, I'm seeing the exact opposite. The stabilization feature rocks too! This is the best camera I've seen in this price range. Completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for this average guy
Reviews.Author: W. Benton
Reviews.Content: I'm not a camera expert, just the dad of a 5 year old that wants to capture great memories.  It's easy to use, compact, and takes great pictures.  The processor and it's capabilities is amazing - from automatically detecting light levels so you don't get dark photos (I just took a great picture of my son, in the dark, in bed sleeping) to finding faces the picture and focusing on them correctly.  It also has a great feature allowing the user to take continuous photos with very little delay.

Reviews.Title: Mega O.I.S Is Great. OK Pics
Reviews.Author: M. Siau "cherokeerebel"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera looking for something simple. I sell on eBay and just wanted something easy that took good pics, especially close ups and inside. In the iA mode it does not take good pics inside. In fact, I have tried playing with the settings but still no luck. Many of my pics have a red tint. I have tried different lighting conditions too. Inside, in my experience only, it works best depending on the flash. That being said it leaves shadows on my ebay items and yes, I try using stand alone lighting. I will say the image stabilization is wonderful! That's why I bumped it up to 4 stars as opposed to 3. To use the macro mode place the camera close to the object and try not to use the zoom. Also, outside it takes nice, sharp pics. In my totally uneducated opinion I would suggest someone looking for a camera to take a lot of indoor pics to try something else. This camera is nice if you're mainly taking outside pics. One really cool feature of this camera is the ability to zoom while taking video. I do believe the value for what I paid was good ($160) and Amazon shipped it quickly although they should have put some filler in the shipping box so the box inside didn't bounce around. I've only had it a few days and if I figure out maybe I'm doing something wrong or find settings that correct the "red" problem I will certainly come back and update.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ4S is a great little camera.
Reviews.Author: C. Novotny
Reviews.Content: We received the camera very quickly and all was well.  It's easy to use and the photos look very good (haven't had any printed as yet, but on the screen they look good).  We recommend the seller and the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic i have been using it for 10 days now and the photos have come out great.In many different conditions (snow, rain, blue skies, night mode or movement) the Ia setting has worked very well the face recognition is allso very good.The best thing of the camera off course the 10x zoom fitted in such a small camera.

Reviews.Title: Lumix is Exceptional!
Reviews.Author: Demeter
Reviews.Content: I've been using this camera for about six months and am impressed with its versatility and performance.  Although it is somewhat heavy in my pocket, it fits, and I am always happy to have it with me.  At this price, it is amazing to have a 10X wide angle Leica lens. This camera takes exceptional photographsPros: Ease of Use; 10X Wide Angle Leica Lens; Outstanding results.Cons: Some lag time; no viewfinder.

Reviews.Title: Love the zoom
Reviews.Author: Picky Ooney "Momofboys"
Reviews.Content: As easy to use as my Canon Elph was.  A bit bigger but worth it for the 10x zoom!!!

Reviews.Title: a good compact point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Yongfu Wang
Reviews.Content: It has an excellent Leika len for 10x optical room, and the IA mode is very useful, you can get good quality photos easily, just point and shoot. It would take a while for the camera to focus on the object you want.

Reviews.Title: Better Than I Expected
Reviews.Author: JNX
Reviews.Content: This camera is absolutely wonderful.  Easy to use, amazing zoom, fantastic video capability.  I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Lumix shines
Reviews.Author: Sam Fowlkes "samfolks"
Reviews.Content: For a small camera to have 10X optical zoom power with image stabilization is awesome. But its best features is the scene1, scene2 option, ie. you can set scene1 for landscapes, scene2 for sports then depending on your subject a quick move of the selection dial allows you to go from auto to landscape or sports. GREAT feature.

Reviews.Title: panasonic Lumix camera
Reviews.Author: Tammy L. Malsom
Reviews.Content: Absolutely wonderful camera.  The 10x wide angle brings everything close and vibrant.  There are so many special features to help you take wonderful, sharp pictures in any light.  I would recommend this camera to everyone.  My mother ran out and bought it after seeing the pictures it took on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Luv my Lumix
Reviews.Author: P. Wales
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TZ4K as a back-up to the TZ4K I recently bought for a trip to Peru.  I so loved the first, I wanted to be sure I had another TZ4 if something happened to the one I have.I'm not a technically savvy photo-geek, but I am an enthusiastic photographer.  The "Intelligent Auto" feature on the TZ4K is just what the doctor ordered -- I can capture photos under all kinds of light conditions and activity speeds as well as shots of close-up to faraway objects without having to think about it.  I took over a thousand pictures including ones from moving vehicles, and they all turned out great.If there's a negative aspect to this camera, I haven't found it.

Reviews.Title: Great Point & Shoot without loosing quality.
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I previously had a much larger Fuji that seemed to always take blurry pics.  I wanted to keep the amount of zoom and have a much more compact camera and get a perfect picture quality that my Fuji lacked.  I've only had this camera one week but have taken many different pics in many different lighting/places.  These include baseball game, restaurants, work/office, home (& others' homes) and just driving down the road.  I have to say this totally meets my requirements for easy to use and still GREAT quality photos.  I would definitely recommend this for someone looking for the same in a compact package.  I did note this is heavier than it looks (not too heavy) but I'm sure that is b/c the good quality parts.  Buy this camera!!

Reviews.Title: Summertime blues
Reviews.Author: Ashley Gray
Reviews.Content: I was hoping I'd really like this camera. After all, a great lens and powerful zoom fitting in my pocket is very cool. Other reviews I'd read suggested this would be a great travel camera.Unfortunately, I cannot agree. Without a viewfinder, the reflective lcd is virtually impossible to see on a bright day. In fact, with my prescription sunglasses, there was no image whatsoever. With them off, I could barely make out my shot, but with no definition. I did read the manual and adjusted the display for outdoors, but it still was very poor. Further, with the lcd operational, I couldn't get more then 70 shots on a battery charge.I had a Canon before, and ended up going back to another. I didn't get the lense and zoom, but I sure feel I got a more thought out camera. Right from the manual (didn't need a magnifying glass to read it) to the auto focus, the Canon just seems to get it right more of the time.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Joao C. Dacosta
Reviews.Content: The combination of number of shooting features and good quality for the price, 10 times zoom, Leica lenses, makes it probably one of the best of this category in the market.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Thomas C. Voltaggio "tvoltagg"
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic.  I bought a TZ1 several years ago and really loved the small size and 10X optical zoom.  It was great for vacation shooting.  I decided to give it to my daughter so I could get the "same" camera with 8 Mega Pixels.There's no other point and shoot camera this small with 10x optical zoom.I recommend it completely.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Hometown Philly
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about one month.  The zoom quality is good, although extreme close-ups have not come out as hoped.  This could be my skill level - I'm still learning how to use the camera.Overall, I'm satisfied with the speed and performance of the camera.  It's easy to use and not difficult to navigate the menu.  Out of the box, it is a simple set up.

Reviews.Title: Nicholas
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Scott "Nicko"
Reviews.Content: Very very good camera, I am very impressed. I purchased it for my girlfriend who originally had a canon sd1000 which she managed to drop after 2 months of owning it. However, it seems like it was a turn for the better. I am far more impressed with the features of this camera, the zoom is amazing and the scenery pre-sets are great as well. overall I would say it out performs the sd1000 in many areas. However there is one little disappointment and its the  darkness of the pictures when using the AI features, but that can easily be overcome with the backlight setting. All in all, she is very happy with it and so am I so I decided to purchase the Z5 for myself. That will come with another review when I take a couple hundred pictures with it haha.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great.
Reviews.Author: bigjr
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great in good lighting.  In lower light, it's not great, but I've seen far worse.  Every once in a while, after taking a photo, I can't get it to take another photo until I do something with the controls.  Haven't figure it out.  I haven't played with it long enough to rule out user error, but it is annoying watching people's smiles go stale.  Anyways, for the price, I'm not complaining.  Seems like one of the better deals in it's class.  I'm going to keep using it ... maybe even read the manual one of these days.  The IA setting isn't that great.

Reviews.Title: retired professor
Reviews.Author: richy
Reviews.Content: I desired a camera that could be easily put into a pocket or purse. It was to replace an old Fuji point and shoot, with a 6X zoom and to supplement a DSLR. The Fuji never worked well in low light and even worse when I used the flash. The Lumix TZ4 was to replace my old buddy. The reviews on the Lumix were outstanding -- however all that glitters is not gold. While the TZ4 worked well in bright light it was extremely disappointing when used in low light levels -- inspite of all it's rave reviews. It was not a whole lot better with the flash. I sent it back after using it for a week and bought a Canon SX110 IS. WOW, what a difference and the zoom at 10X is better than my Fuji's 6X and the Lumix. And the colors and performance in low level light is wonderful. The image stabilization works well also. I also bought a Canon DSLR Rebel Xsi and this little SX110 has a performance that is quite competitive to the Rebel, except the little guy has a much better zoom! And it fits into my pocket!

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera for the Pocket
Reviews.Author: ElmoTheCat
Reviews.Content: Can't ask for an easier to use menu interface. Great pictures. Umpteen picture taking modes. Everything is automatic, meaning there is no manual aperture or exposure settings. Having just gotten this recently, I was surprised the easy the shooting mode dial turns... maybe too easy. in fact, I wonder if it's loose... anybody owning same, please comment.

Reviews.Title: One Pretty Good Camera.
Reviews.Author: Sloan D.
Reviews.Content: Thus far, this has been one very good camera!  It is easy to use.  I have taken some very good pictures of sports events, dimly lit indoor events, and even a self-portrait. It seems to be just the right camera for point-and-shoot, amateur photographers such as myself.  Since I'm not a serious photographer, I can not attest to the specific perks of owning this camera.  Yet, I would suggest this camera to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Not for pics of kids indoors
Reviews.Author: Ruth Princess "Your Fairy Godmother"
Reviews.Content: I used to have the FX01 and everyday that I used it, which was close to every day, I would say how much I loved this camera.  Then it fatally broke and I "upgraded" to the TZ4.  Every other day that I use this camera, I say how much I hate it!!!I know I should give it 3 stars because for outdoor shots it is 5 stars but candid indoors a 1 star might be too generous.I feel as though I was ripped off by several hundred dollars.  When I first got the camera 2 years ago, I took tons of outdoor pictures of Chicago buildings in the bright summer sunlight.  The zoom would take a clear picture over 50 stories high (check out my Jetsons Chicago video on Youtube ruthejp13).  But once I brought the camera indoors after it was too late to return it, I discovered the horrible flaws.  People in the corners and background of bad lighting shots looked like they were Coneheads.  If the main subject wasn't blurred, which was often the case, the further depth subjects looked like something in a carnival house of mirrors.  Now I don't even carry the camera with me anymore because I hate it so much.  One of the reasons I liked my first Panasonic is because I could do so much with it.  I knew all the settings and best way to capture what I wanted.  With this camera it doesn't matter what setting, it won't take good pictures of moving kids indoors.  I know, I've tried everything for the past two years.They upgraded the firmware once for better focusing and it helped but not enough.  I would love to compare it to an old fashion film camera because I think the processor is messing up the pictures instead of improving them.  What good is a "image stabilization" if round-faced baby looks like her head was pulled to a point with forceps?  It might be a nice clear picture but not accurate by any means.I'm thinking about getting something without image stabilization or focus just so if the picture is bad, I know it's my fault.  Not really but that's how bad it is.  Seriously though, one picture the kid was in the upper corner and the next picture that same kid was in the center.  You could not tell he was that same child and the picture was taken a second later.  When framed artwork in a background corner looks curved, you know there is something wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: MR "M"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. Makes great pictures with little trouble. The shipping was fast although I was a bit scared when I couldn't track it online since Amazon's link didn't work.

Reviews.Title: chucky
Reviews.Author: Charles Edward Jaster
Reviews.Content: excellent camera in both price/features-bought one for myself and one for xmas presesnt-zoom is fantastic on camera-panasonic makes great products ,easy to use and great value for price- overall great purchase-Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ4K 8.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Wide Angle MEGA Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Black)

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal!
Reviews.Author: COSTA RICA "PURA VIDA"
Reviews.Content: Everything went perfect. The product is great and the delivery was according to schedule. In the past, I didn't trust on buying articles on the web, but now, thanks to Amazon, I'm confident that everything I buy for in this website will be delivered on time and in perfect conditions. EVERY DEAL IS A GREAT DEAL WITH AMAZON!!

Reviews.Title: very nice camera, wait till the price drop under $200
Reviews.Author: CheapTech
Reviews.Content: Very good all around camera for beginner and intermediate user.10x optical zoom is simply amazing, surprisingly packed in the size of a wallet. Big lense as well. Very satisfied with this purchase. Its price dipped to $160 in Dec 2008 for some reason; only last couple of days...Maybe it'll happen some other in the future?

Reviews.Title: Terrific camera
Reviews.Author: Gary I. Busman
Reviews.Content: Best camera I have ever had. Useage is exceptionable. Pictues fantastic. Would recommend to anyone desiring a 10X zoom. Like 2 cameras in one.

Reviews.Title: I like this camera
Reviews.Author: drippy fausett
Reviews.Content: Haven't used it a whole lot so still learning to use it.  Seems to be a well built camera except for the plastic tripod mount and the some what flimsy lens cover.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Dr. Josh L. Handt "Dr. Josh"
Reviews.Content: This camera works great as a second camera to my SLR. Some funky menu settings, but very easy to use.  I would recommend it.-Josh

Reviews.Title: panasonic lumix camera
Reviews.Author: P. M. Gregory LLC "pmg1291"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent canera for the money. I really like the clear close-ups, picture quallity is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Best little camera AND a fantastic price
Reviews.Author: J. Jaczkowski "M Jaczkowski"
Reviews.Content: This camera is what I have been waiting for. It does it all. Easy to follow instructions. Easy to follow menus on the camera. Super photos and videos . And a price that did not hurt my budget.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Cherity "Go Sox"
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this camera.  It was the most megapixels and zoom that I could find for this price.  My pictures have come out great and it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great value, wide-angle lens
Reviews.Author: Jim Moore
Reviews.Content: This camera is performing very well, especially the 28mm lens.  It makes all the different for interior shots of real estate.

Reviews.Title: Help!!!
Reviews.Author: John H. Gruver "brainactiv"
Reviews.Content: I've gone to Panasonic's site, downloaded the firmware update, but there are no instructions on how to do it???!!! My computer will not open the download. The camera doesn't recognize the download... what????Fantastic camera, btw. Bought it for my in-laws...

Reviews.Title: panasonic lumix dmc tz4k
Reviews.Author: Norman Cohen
Reviews.Content: A first class digital camera for the price. The zeiss lens is certainly a main attraction. Its features assure an excellent result.The one drawback is that there isn't a view finder. It's extremely difficult to size up a photo with the sun on the lcd monitor.

Reviews.Title: Failed in 4 months, warranty too short, other problems
Reviews.Author: frannyglass "frannyglass"
Reviews.Content: This camera has great features and great value.Except:1. The camera failed after 4 months--and wouldn't turn on.2. The camera has a problem focusing when you're fully zoomed in3. The control wheel at the top is poorly designed so that it gets moved and out of place all the time4. The warranty that Panasonic extends is criminally short: 90 days!5. The screen sticks out from the camera making it vulnerable to breakage and making it highly susceptible to glare.Otherwise it's a great value for the money!

Reviews.Title: Bad Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: William F. Sherman
Reviews.Content: Camera has great zoom qualities. The picture quality is very poor. I dont care how you adjust the camera, it still will not take vivid pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent outdoor rambling camera
Reviews.Author: D. P. Schroeder "Paukenwirbel"
Reviews.Content: I'm extremely impressed with the Leica lens and Venus IV engine in this camera for outdoor pics, especially with the wide angle (28mm eq.) through 10x optical zoom (15.9x w/digital).  Pictures are extremely clear with great color and very little distortion.  Plus, with its size, you can easily buy a "fanny"-type carry bag that hooks on your belt, and if you're walking around or hiking, biking, etc., it's extremely convenient.I have had some problems similar to those reported elsewhere with indoor shots in moderately low light.  The flash is ok, but it's easy to cover up with your right middle finger.  Plus, the Auto White Balance has some problems in low light, especially, producing some pictures that definitely need some post-processing to look good.  This is the only reason I deducted one star.  My biggest disappointment is that it's not as good as my Canon PowerShot A720IS 8MP Digital Camera with 6x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom for indoor photos, though it has the capability to be better since it has a wide-angle option which should really improve upon the Canon.Interestingly, it takes excellent macro pics, even in NO light (see my pics I've uploaded).  It's true that with this lens, you can't get quite as close to the subject as with other digital pocket cameras, but I'm still thrilled with the results.Overall, I'm quite pleased, though I think that to take advantage of the best features of this camera, it's best used outdoors in fairly good light.

Reviews.Title: Go for a Sony
Reviews.Author: M. Gunther
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for just over a year.  It's very easy to use and has a nice menu of photo taking options, but the photos aren't great.  Last week I was walking in the house and dropped in and now it won't turn on - it's just completely dead.  It's not like I dropped it from a great distance - it was just from my hand to the floor.  Makes me think the construction isn't great.My father has a Sony CyberShot DSCW170 and the photos it takes are amazing.  I would recommend that and will buy a Sony for my next camera.

Reviews.Title: Descent
Reviews.Author: Doug Green
Reviews.Content: No frills, feels really solid, pretty compact for a 10x. But I think if I had to do it over I would get the TZ5K, the manual is annoying when it says it can do a certian function then has a * saying TZ5 only....

Reviews.Title: It does everything and is good quality
Reviews.Author: L. Rangel "buyer"
Reviews.Content: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ4K 8.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Wide Angle MEGA Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Black)great product and does everything. Still learning about its capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic TZ4S
Reviews.Author: Paul Ashley
Reviews.Content: I own a Panasonic LZ3 5MP far superior to the TZ4S. So I thought I would upgrade to 8MP and 10optical zoom instead of the 6X optical zoom. I will definitely return this camera. Ugh! Like the earlier reviewer said great stats poor camera. Controls are a little sharp with rough edges for starters. Secondly, the offset placement of the lens leaves no room to place your fingers to steady the camera. Forget the other reviews and this camera as it is very poor. Leica lens you say.. if you have to put your fingers over it to steady camera where is the rub...

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ4S is a piece of junk!!
Reviews.Author: E. D. Davey
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ4S in late December 2008.  I took the camera to New Zealand for what I thought would be a great vacation.  The camera stopped working on the second day of the Milford trek.  The camera did not get wet. It was in our waterproof gear and nothing else got wet that was in the same area. Instead, it seems that the humidity was too much for it to handle. At first we got a card read error, tried a different card, got the same error, then tried to use the internal memory on the camera, but it started flashing different error messages then went kaput.I would not recommend any one buy this camera!  Unless, of course, you want your vacation ruined.  I would not recommend any one buy a camera from Amazon because of their 30 day return policy.

Reviews.Title: Tempting specs; bad product! Really bad.
Reviews.Author: Sanjay Bhandari "Ziffusion"
Reviews.Content: It looks great on paper - wide angle Leica lens, 10x zoom, 8.1MP, wide screen modes, image stabilization. What a disappointment though.1. Pictures come out grainy (noisy). And it is VERY obvious; you don't have to use a magnifier to see it.2. Bad performance in low light.3. The camera stopped working within minutes of receiving it. Kept displaying message "shutdown camera and start it again" - but to no avail.4. Somewhat bulky for a compact.I'll stick with Canon thank you.(This review is for the product. Amazon was GREAT with their no fuss return policy!)

Reviews.Title: it's a very beginer's camera
Reviews.Author: I. Toufique
Reviews.Content: this is a camera for very beginers. if you are a occasional user, this is an OK camera for you.  I took this thing to take pictures in a wedding, after taking 15-17 pictures, the unit started to hit up, flash was sucking up all the battery juice.

ProductInfo.Features:
8.1-megapixel resolution captures enough detail for photo-quality 16x 22-inch prints
10x optical zoom Leica DC lens; Face Detection
New Panasonic Venus Engine IV improves noise reduction, elevates the detection accuracy and corrective effects
2.5-inch LCD; Mega O.I.S. and Intelligent ISO
Captures images to SD memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ4S 8.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Wide Angle MEGA Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Silver)
